rows.label: tev001294_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, [ST:playername ]. How's it going?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was just about to go shopping to get ready
for dinner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0003
rows.name: What do you feel like eating tonight?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_JNK0010
rows.name: Offer

rows.label: tev001294_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you'll take care of dinner tonight.

rows.label: tev001294_JNK0020
rows.name: Invite

rows.label: tev001294_SEL0021
rows.name: Take Lin clothes shopping with you first.

rows.label: tev001294_JNK0030
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: tev001294_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Lin to just cook up Tatsu already.

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0004
rows.name: Whoa, really? Okay![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0005
rows.name:
What do you want to cook?
Do you have a specialty?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_JNK0110
rows.name: Sashimi

rows.label: tev001294_SEL0111
rows.name: Boast about your world-famous sashimi.

rows.label: tev001294_JNK0120
rows.name: Barbecue

rows.label: tev001294_SEL0121
rows.name: Claim your barbecue makes grown men weep.

rows.label: tev001294_JNK0130
rows.name: Crème Brûlée

rows.label: tev001294_SEL0131
rows.name:
Say men have fought duels for
a bite of your crème brûlée.

rows.label: tev001294_JNK0140
rows.name: Cupcakes

rows.label: tev001294_SEL0141
rows.name: Brag that your cupcakes are the finest in the land.

rows.label: tev001294_JNK0150
rows.name: Omelets

rows.label: tev001294_SEL0151
rows.name: Insist that your omelets are more valuable than gold.

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0006
rows.name: Er, sashimi? Really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0007
rows.name:
Not sure how it can be "world-famous" when all you're
doing is cutting up raw fish, but hey, whatever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm sure Nagi would be delighted. And I hardly ever
have it myself, so I'm certainly up for trying some.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0009
rows.name:
Okay, it's a plan! ...Although it would probably help
if we had some fresh fish, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0010
rows.name: Barbecue, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0011
rows.name:
But that's not really "cooking," right?
Isn't that just...barbecuing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0012
rows.name:
Although they do say protein is good for building
stamina and muscle. Eat enough of that stuff, and
before long, you'll start looking like Vandham![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0013
rows.name: All right, barbecue it is! I'll go buy us some meat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0014
rows.name: Crème brûlée?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0015
rows.name:
I...actually really like crème brûlée. And I've tried to
make it a bunch of times, but it never works out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0016
rows.name:
I'm impressed that you'd have such a difficult food
as your specialty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0017
rows.name:
But, uh...crème brûlée isn't really a dinner course.
Or even an appropriate side dish, really.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0018
rows.name:
How about I handle the dinner menu, and we'll put you
in charge of dessert, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0019
rows.name:
Best of both worlds, right?
I can't wait to try out your crème brûlée![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0020
rows.name: What? You're a baker?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0021
rows.name:
Wow, that's pretty impressive. I'm sure Secretary Nagi
and Director General Chausson will be delighted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0022
rows.name:
But you can't really just eat cupcakes for dinner.
That's not very...healthy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0023
rows.name:
How about I handle the dinner menu, and we'll put you
in charge of dessert, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0024
rows.name:
Best of both worlds, right?
I can't wait to try out your cupcakes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0025
rows.name: Omelets? Wow. Those are hard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0026
rows.name:
You gotta get the texture just right...
You can't mess up the flip at the end...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0027
rows.name:
But that look on your face tells me you've got a lot
of confidence in your flipping arm![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0028
rows.name:
Welp, omelets it is then. I like mine half-cooked
and runny, by the way![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0029
rows.name:
I'll go buy us some eggs and butter while you get
the frying pan ready.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0030
rows.name: Hey, are you trying to say my clothes are lame?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0031
rows.name:
Actually...I don't think you've ever even seen me in
street clothes, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0032
rows.name:
I always just wear my ground gear because it's
comfortable. Plus, I don't have a lot of confidence
in my fashion sense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0033
rows.name:
But I might feel awkward if it's just you and me—
like I was a big fashion emergency or something.
So let's do it another time and invite Elma, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0034
rows.name:
Oh, and since it's your invitation, I assume you're
the one buying, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0035
rows.name: Cha-ching! Looking forward to it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0036
rows.name:
But actually, this is no time to be thinking about that—
I've got a dinner menu to prepare![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0037
rows.name: Come on, be serious. We can't eat Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0038
rows.name:
He's nowhere NEAR fat enough yet. If we cook him
up now, it'd just be a waste of good Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0039
rows.name:
...You should really see your face right now. I'm joking!
So, seriously—what are we having for dinner?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0040
rows.name:
We had Salisbury steak last night, and Secretary Nagi's
homemade soba noodles the night before that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0041
rows.name:
So I guess tonight could only be one thing.
Which is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0042
rows.name: Whiiiiiich iiiiiiis...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0043
rows.name: What? You really don't know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0044
rows.name:
Beef stew, silly! That way we can use up all the
leftover ground beef and noodles![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001294_MSG0045
rows.name: Trust me, it'll be great.[ST:wait ]
